resources.string: Hello! My name is John, I am a passionate Android Developer and I love playing Table tennis
I am an Android Developer looking to learn, build and publish apps with beautiful user interfaces and great user experience.
I believe that CodePath will offer me a wonderful opportunity to learn the core concepts of Android Application Development and gain experience in building Enterprise and Scalable Android apps.

I am looking forward to making the best out of this 10 weeks of learning by connecting with peers, mentors and senior developers in the Android ecosystem. And most importantly, releasing a couple of apps to the Google Play Store.
